amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part D of House Report 118-466 to require the annual China Military Power report to provide an assessment of the country's development in critical and emerging technologies and identify key China entities involved in each technology sector.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gimenez amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gimenez amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
